edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action

? AddOfficeVisitAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.base.PatientBaseAction
      • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.AddOfficeVisitAction

  • public class AddOfficeVisitAction
extends PatientBaseAction
    Used for Document Office Visit page (documentOfficeVisit.jsp). This just adds an empty office visit, and provides a list of office visits in case you want to edit an old office visit. Very similar to AddPatientAction
    ??:
    Andy Meneely
